titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-11-01 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 1, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performers Johnnie & Jack, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 995th broadcast.

subject.topic: United States. Armed Forces Radio Service
